translation: [Zengchuan] The Chan Master Huanpu (successor to Jisan) of Shaoshan in Luojing was asked by a monk.
"How is the territory of Shaoshan?
The master said.
"Ancient and modern apes and birds raise their voices.
The emerald colors are thin and smoky.
He said, "How is this person in the realm?
The teacher said.
'Stand back and look at it.'
The verse said.
'It's best to look at the border of Shaoshan.
The emerald colors of the smoky shrine are light.
I want to describe it, but I haven't yet done so.
The apes and birds make one sound.
(Shixi Yue).
[Zengzhao] Shaoshan was visiting his teacher because of his monk's robe.
We met at the bottom of the mountain.
Zun asked.
"Where does the Shaoshan road lead to?
The teacher pointed his finger and said.
"Aah! Where does the blue and dull go?
Zun went up to him and held him there, saying.
"I've been longing for Shaoshan.
Is it possible?
The teacher said.
"Yes, it is.
What's the matter with you, Ajātaśatru?
Zun said.
'I'd like to ask a question.'
Will the master answer again?
The master said.
"I see that you didn't make the gold tooth.
He rushed to unbend his bow and shoot at Azure.
He said, "The phoenix goes straight up into the smoky sky.
Who's afraid of a wild bird in the forest?
The teacher said.
'Let me beat the picture drum at the imperial palace.
Let's try to display our style like an old monk.
He said, "One phrase is so far beyond a thousand sages.
'The pines and roses aren't on par with the moon wheels.'
The teacher said.
"Rao, you've directly escaped from the sound of authoritative power.
It's still half a moon's ride farther than Shaoshan.
He said, "Where's the mistake?
The teacher said.
'That kind of disrespectful speech is known to exist at the time.'
If that's the case, then he's really different from the jade and mud.
It doesn't remove the dust of myriad opportunities.
The teacher said.
'Under the tutelage of Lu Ban, we only use ingenuity.'
He said, "A student would then think this.
He didn't want to know what the master thought.
The master said.
'The jeweled maiden throws a shuttle at night.
She weaves a brocade in the west room.

source_sentence: 曰莫便是和尚家風也無。
translation: He said, "Could it be that this is the monk's family style?
The master said.
"A plowman cracks a jade drain.
It's not made by a practicing monk.
He said, "This is still a figure of speech.
How is this the style of a monk's family?'
The master said.
"He's a bodhisattva who's going to take on the universe.
Who is the one who stands out?
Zun was speechless.
The master then returned to the mountain with him.
He had only just finished his work.
He summoned him close to him and said.
"The preceptor has the energy to leap into the sky.
The old monk has the energy to enter the ground.
The Ajātaśatru swallowed a huge ocean, but the old monk carried Sumeru on his back.
The old monk carries Sumeru on his back.
The Ajātaśatru then pressed his hand and came up.
I waited with my spear in the air.
He went up the road and quickly explained the way.
He said, "A clear mirror will stand on the platform.
He asked the master to take a look at it.
The master said.
No, I won't.
He said, "Why don't you examine it?
The master said.
'The water is shallow, and there's no fish, so I have to fish.'
Zun said nothing.
The teacher then struck him.
The verse said.
"He adapts to the times and changes accordingly.
He follows things to their fullest extent.
The aspiration of a great swan.
Who can tell the difference between male and female?
Hanhou has yet to meet them.
He's a patched-robe family man.
It's not like there's no plan to sweep the three Qin kingdoms away.
Why should loyalty and righteousness be so troublesome to recall?
(Fangan Xian).
[Zengzhao] was asked by a monk in Shaoshan.
"Is there a place where right and wrong don't reach?
Is there another phrase?
The teacher said there was.
He asked what phrase it was.
The teacher said.
'A white cloud that doesn't reveal its ugliness.'
The verse goes.
'A solitary cloud that doesn't reveal its ugliness.
A white cloud leans on the father of a green mountain.
The cranes' nests are dripping with spirits, and their dreams are beginning to return.
The new moon is half-hooked and rises above ten thousand households.
(Zetuhui).
Alone, he cuts off the many currents in the vast ocean.
He dances around idly, tossing a golden hook.
The white clouds don't reveal the width of the smoky waves.
With a single sound of the flute, it's autumn in heaven and earth.
(Muan Yong).
[Zengchuan] A monk at Shaoshan asked.
"How is this the monk's family style?
The master said.
"The top of the head is made of rootless grass.
Without a breeze, its leaves shake on their own.
He spoke in verse.
"The solitary peak of Miao Feng is quite fat and greasy.
Its spiritual seedlings produced by the gods don't touch the ground.
Its emerald leaves always shake on their own without wind.
Their fragrance is always tingling with the spring light.
(Tanxia Jun).
[Zengzhao] Shaoshan was visited by a monk.
He paid homage and stood up.
The master said.
"Great is the talent that hides the clumsy door.
The saṃgha passed by and stood to one side.
The master said.
"We've lost our standing-bridge material.
The verse said.
"You must know that you've crossed the river with your palms together.
As he progresses further, he'll be set adrift.
"Suppose he turned stubborn copper into gold.
It's only possible to conceal it from other, unobservant people.
(Danxia chun), vol. 27
